item.title: CUDA support
item.description: Gorgonia comes with CUDA support out of the box. However, usage is specialized. To use CUDA, you must build your application with the build tag cuda, like so: go build -tags='cuda' . Furthermore, there are some additional requirements: CUDA toolkit is required. Installing this installs the nvcc compiler which is required to run your code with CUDA (Be sure to follow the post-installation steps). go install gorgonia.org/gorgonia/cmd/cudagen. This installs the cudagen program.
